   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Pytero's documentation!
==================================
Pytero is a flexible API wrapper for the `Pterodactyl Game Panel <https://Pterodactyl.io>`_ in
Python using ``async``/``await`` syntax and up-to-date typings for proper type-checker support.

Getting Started
---------------
* :doc:`Introduction`
* :doc:`Examples`
* :doc:`Advanced`

Support
-------
Feel free to join our `Discord server <https://discord.com/invite/dwcfTjgn7S>`_ or open an issue on the
`Github repo <https://github.com/PteroPackages/Pytero/issues>`_ for support.

   :maxdepth: 1

   api
